thread.title: Executive Director - Sports Management

title: Executive Director - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Executive Director Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Develop and maintain an effective relationship with the USOC, including increasing athlete support and financial grants.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
